title: Himi 660
lyrics:
M.L.
1.
Ko e matapa ‘o Palataisi
Kuo fakaava ‘e Kalaisi,
Ko e ‘ofa kuo mahua mai
Ke vete ‘a ia na’e ha’i.
2.
Ko e ta’ata’a he tohi ia
‘O e fakamolemole hia,
Ongona hoto laumālie
‘A e nonga mo e tu’amelie.
3.
Kuo pau ke tali he Tamai
‘A e loto mafasia lahi;
Ongona leva ‘ete tangi
‘I he ‘alofi ‘o e langi.
4.
Ko e ‘ofa ‘ena ta’emalau
Afeitaulalo kia au:
Mapelu hifo loto ‘o’oku
‘O fakamālo he Taupotu.
5.
‘A e ‘univeesi tokanga’i
‘Āngelo mo e taka langi
Mo ha’a tangata mou tefua
Ke fakamālō he ‘Otua.*
